document_data.name: Hickory Oil
document_data.mainbody: '''Hickory oil''' was a type of edible vegetable oil in the Realms,
document_data.Availability:
Hickory oil was commonly available in most markets, and used by bakers and [[alchemist]]s alike.{{Cite dragon/81/Living in a material world|63}}

[[Aurora's Whole Realms Catalogue (in-universe)|Aurora's Whole Realms Catalogue]] sold hickory oil at a standard price of one [[gold piece]] per {{SI|1|gal|l|long=yes}} in its "Priest's Alcove" section, intended for use with [[spell]]s and [[ritual]]s.
document_data.Usages: Hickory oil found some use as a [[material component]] by [[priest]]s and [[druid]]s. It could be used for the ''[[reflecting pool]]'' spell, with [[walnut oil]] as an alternative.{{Cite dragon/71/From the Sorcerer's Scroll|7}}
